title: Disappearance
description: An Israeli Thriller... When Mikki meets Karen, an American volunteer at the Kibbutz in 1984, it is love at first sight. But on a day trip, Karen vanishes & for some reason there is a cover-up leaving the case unsolved. Three years later a terrorist is killed by Armed Forces, who find a roll of negatives showing Karen alive... But will they find her?
author: Niv Kaplan
